add.p: Walls that Talk: a Transcript of the Names, Initials and Sentiments, Writen and Graven on the Walls, Doors, and Windows of the Libby Prison at Richmond by the Prisoners of 1861-65. 16mo. paper, pp. 19. Richmond (Va.). 1s. 6d.
